linked jumps

2022-10-28: connecting zelda majora's mask jumping to mario 64 jumping. in n64 Zeldas jump is contextual, there's no jump button. reading the memory to see changes in link vertical speed and sending osc messages between the processes to communicate. TODO: try a single video stream, alternating games on jump.

inspiration

techniques

  • simulate key/controller input (e.g. trigger a jump)
  • set parameters or trigger events based on game state values (e.g. Mario X position)
  • blending
  • add whatever original sound

tools

  • BizHawk
  • OSC
